title: No me sincroniza la cuenta de firefox
content: La cuenta de Firefox no sincroniza El día de ayer formateé el PC y pues instalé Firefox (porque es el navegador de mi preferencia), ingresé normal a mi cuenta como de costumbre, pero al momento de sincronizarla (para que me importe los marcadores, favoritos, contraseñas, etc. que siempre he tenido con la cuenta) no dejaba, le doy en donde dice "Sincronizar ahora", y queda "sincronizando" y vuelve a aparecer "Sincronizar ahora".
creator: dianacau

title: Change to userchrome border rendering 113
content:
I just noticed that Windows Firefox version 113 changes how this userchrome border is rendered.

  1. TabsToolbar-customization-target {

border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-color: var(--tabs-border-color); } On my accidental airgapped machine running 112 the border is properly rendered as 1px. But on all my machines running 113 it's being rendered as 0.566667 which is rounded down to 0. I also noticed that my separators between the tabs seem to be thinner.

Before I try to counter it by setting my css to use 2px which is interpreted as 1.7 and rounded down to 1, can you please tell me WHAT is going on? Thanks.

P.S. My userchrome.css include much more than this, hence why it looks strange on a default profile, but the effects are still visible.
creator: Funtime60

title: Can't open first pinned tab when FF window maximized
content:
When FF (113.0.1) is maximized clicking on the first (left hand) pinned tab does not open the tab. Hovering over the tab doesn't change the background color of the tab.

If I restore down the window, hovering over the tab changes the background color of the tab from light grey to a slightly darker grey and clicking the tab opens it.
creator: leg204
